bibl.title: The Date of P. Kell. I G. 62 and the Meaning of xvr€on <chorion>.
bibl.note: 273/4 is the latest possible date for the tablet. The dominant sense of xvr€on is that of non-inundated land, primarily used for growing tree crops of various sorts, but especially vineyards, and sometimes also containing farm buildings or equipment. <chorion>
BAGNALL Roger S., The Date of P. Kell. I G. 62 and the Meaning of xvr€on <chorion>.
